text: 23:13 1 Atriviba 11:7Josaia, Atrivim Solomon fomɨra ofa gamir dakozir Jerusalemɨn amadaghan aruem anadi naghɨn, Olivɨn Mɨghsɨamɨn sautɨn amadaghan itibagh asɨghasɨki.23:13 Gumazir akɨnafarir kam osirizim, mɨghsɨamɨn ikezir bizir kurar kabagh nɨghnɨsi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, danganir kam, Hibrun akam, ziar igharazim Olivɨn Mɨghsɨam gatɨ, a “Mɨghsɨar Ikuvim.” Aser kaba, aser amizir kuram Astarte, ko Moapian aser kuram Kemos, ko Amonian aser kuram Molek, Solomon dar ziaba fasa ofa gamir dakozir kabar ingari. Aser kaba, kar Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn bizir bar kurar a bar aghuaziba.
